questions.title: Two Whats And A Wow: Fingerprints
questions.description: Watch and listen to this 1 minute video to learn the category for today!

questions.question: What in the world are the rules of the game?

choices.answer: You select the made up WHATS?!
You select the one true WOW!

questions.question: Which of the following facts about fingerprints is the one true WOW?

choices.answer: Identical twins have the same identical fingerprints
Koalas' & humans' fingerprints are indistinguishable from one another
The oldest fingerprints were found on a fish sculpture from 2000 years ago

questions.title: And the true wow is...
questions.description: Watch and listen to this 1 minute video to see which was the winning WOW!

questions.title: Operation Fingerprint Detective Challenge
questions.description: Watch and listen to this 1:20 video with today's STEAM challenge.  Share your challenge photos with us @ tinkercast.com/share
